errors.error_description: Outdated Python and Django version requirements that are no longer supported
correction_candidates: Python 3.6+, Django 3.2+. Please refer to the requirements_ section of the documentation for a full list of dependencies.
Python 3.8+, Django 4.0+. Please refer to the requirements_ section of the documentation for a full list of dependencies.
Python 3.9+, Django 3.1+. Please refer to the requirements_ section of the documentation for a full list of dependencies.
Python 3.7+, Django 2.2+. Please refer to the requirements_ section of the documentation for a full list of dependencies.
errors.golden_answer: Python 3.6+, Django 3.2+. Please refer to the requirements_ section of the documentation for a full list of dependencies.

errors.error_description: Installing system dependencies after pip package installation, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: To install django-machina, first create a virtual environment, then install system dependencies: sudo apt-get install postgresql-dev python-dev, and finally run pip install django-machina
To install django-machina, first install system dependencies: sudo apt-get install postgresql-dev python-dev, then create a virtual environment and run pip install django-machina
To install django-machina, run pip install django-machina in your activated virtual environment after ensuring system dependencies are installed
To install django-machina, install it directly with pip install django-machina, no system dependencies are required
errors.golden_answer: To install django-machina, first install system dependencies: sudo apt-get install postgresql-dev python-dev, then create a virtual environment and run pip install django-machina
